about.firstParagraph: I‚Äôm Milo≈°, a 26 years old self-taught Full Stack developer, from Serbia residing in Reykjavik, Iceland.
about.secondParagraph: After high school, I got a job as a web developer, where I stayed 1 year. Within this year I've created over 100 simple HTML & CSS websites following given designs, developed up to 15 WordPress websites (few with custom themes and others were purchased). After 1 year working here I have realized that I‚Äôm stuck, sinking and not learning anything new.
about.thirdParagraph: In March 2018, my ex-colleague found me a new job at his firm where I could start going forward and learn some new technologies. I also stayed here 1 year and started exploring the JavaScript and PHP world. I have learned many things building a mobile web app in PHP and a website with a custom backend. Long story short, after that, there were no new projects and I was stuck again.
about.fourthParagraph: I decided it was time for a change, so I started studying ReactJS in my free time. I fell in love with JavaScript and React. Colleague and I got an idea to build a flight booking engine, so I started progressively learning Angular 1 and built the whole booking system with online payment in Angular 1. As I got better in JavaScript I figured that Angular 1 was a bad idea, so I switched again back to ReactJS and started rebuilding the whole system again.
about.fifthParagraph: I received a job offer in April 2019 that allowed me to focus on my personal growth and development, so I seized the opportunity. During my time at that company, I learned a tremendous amount and evolved as a developer. It was there that I truly embraced the mindset of a Full Stack Developer, diving into various technologies such as Laravel, VueJS, and NativeScript (app development).
about.sixthParagraph: In June 2022, I made the difficult decision to leave my job as a Full Stack Developer at Morph Networks, where I had been working since April 2019. I was grateful for the growth and opportunities I had experienced there, but I knew it was time for a new challenge. After taking some time to reflect and explore my options, I decided to make a bold move.
about.seventhParagraph: In October 2022, I relocated to Reykjavik, Iceland, leaving behind my familiar surroundings in Serbia. This was an exciting and somewhat daunting decision, but I was eager to embrace the adventure and grow both personally and professionally. I started a new position with Sidekick Health as a Senior Web Developer, specializing in TypeScript and ReactJS.
about.eighthParagraph: In conclusion, my journey so far has been an incredible rollercoaster of learning and self-discovery. I've transitioned from being a self-taught Full Stack Developer in Serbia to a Senior Web Developer in the thriving digital health industry in Iceland. These experiences have shaped me as a person and a developer, and I'm excited to see where the future will take me.

services.title: Front End
services.description: Helping start-ups, small businesses and agencies achieve high quality websites and exceptional user experience. Technologies I am most experienced with are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, VueJS, React and NativeScript (for mobile applications).

services.title: Back End
services.description: It's not just about making a server, application, and database communicate with each other. It's about building a product that works seamlessly, meets market needs and creating an enjoyable user experience that earns your clients loyalty.

services.title: UI/UX
services.description: You want the website to look exactly how designers initially designed it? I am responsible for applying interactive and visual design principles on your websites and web applications for a positive and cohesive user experience.

services.title: API development
services.description: Creating interfaces between different systems to share data is a modern requirement that the development of application programming interfaces (APIs) and web services fulfils.

services.title: WordPress or Custom CMS
services.description: You need a website that you can easily edit and manage such as a blog website, portfolio or even a big online shop? I will build you a WordPress or Custom CMS unique website that suits your needs.

services.title: Deployment
services.description: Deploying‚Äî or pushing new code to a server‚Äî is an integral part of a developer‚Äôs daily workflow. After deployment, it needs to be connected with Google search and pass all page speed tests.
